roomTypes.name: Overgrown Clearing
roomTypes.description: Dense vines hang from above, creating curtains of green that sway gently in the still air. Wildflowers push through cracks in the ancient stone floor.

roomTypes.name: Mossy Tunnel
roomTypes.description: Soft moss carpets the walls and floor, muffling your footsteps. Moisture drips from the ceiling, feeding the verdant growth.

roomTypes.name: Tangled Thicket
roomTypes.description: Thorny brambles crisscross the passage, forming a natural barrier. Light filters through gaps in the dense foliage above.

roomTypes.name: Vine-Choked Passage
roomTypes.description: Thick vines hang like curtains, obscuring what lies beyond. The air is heavy with the scent of decaying vegetation.

roomTypes.name: Fungal Hollow
roomTypes.description: Bioluminescent mushrooms cast an eerie blue glow across the chamber. Strange fungi of all sizes cluster on every surface.

roomTypes.name: Root Cellar
roomTypes.description: Massive tree roots breach through the ceiling and walls, creating twisted arches. The earthy smell of soil fills the air.

roomTypes.name: Fern Grotto
roomTypes.description: Delicate ferns unfurl from every crack and crevice, creating a lush green tapestry. Dewdrops catch what little light reaches here.

roomTypes.name: Bramble Corridor
roomTypes.description: Sharp thorns line the narrow passage, forcing careful movement. Dead leaves crunch underfoot, breaking the otherwise oppressive silence.

roomTypes.name: Sunken Garden
roomTypes.description: What was once a cultivated space now runs wild with untamed growth. Crumbling planter boxes overflow with invasive vines.

roomTypes.name: Mushroom Den
roomTypes.description: Massive toadstools tower overhead, their caps forming a false ceiling. Spores drift lazily through the air.

entranceRoom.name: Verdant Threshold
entranceRoom.description: You descend into a chamber where nature has reclaimed civilization. Roots push through ancient stonework, and vines cascade down the walls like waterfalls of green.

stairsRoom.name: Descending Garden
stairsRoom.description: Stone steps wind downward through a vertical shaft choked with vegetation. Roots create a natural handrail along the spiraling descent.

roomTypes.name: Crystal Cavern
roomTypes.description: Glittering crystals jut from the walls and ceiling, refracting light into dancing rainbows. The formations sing softly as you pass.

roomTypes.name: Underground Lake
roomTypes.description: Dark water stretches into the shadows, its surface perfectly still. Echoes of dripping water create a rhythmic melody.

roomTypes.name: Narrow Crevice
roomTypes.description: The walls press close on either side, forcing you to turn sideways. Rough stone scrapes against your armor.

roomTypes.name: Stalactite Chamber
roomTypes.description: Countless stone teeth hang from the ceiling, some meeting their stalagmite twins in twisted pillars. Water has sculpted this space over millennia.

roomTypes.name: Echoing Hall
roomTypes.description: A vast natural cathedral stretches before you, its high ceiling lost in darkness. Every sound reverberates for seconds before fading.

roomTypes.name: Sulfur Vent
roomTypes.description: Yellow crystals encrust the walls near steaming fissures. The acrid smell of sulfur burns your nose.

roomTypes.name: Bat Colony
roomTypes.description: Thousands of bats cluster on the ceiling, their chittering filling the air. Guano blankets the floor beneath their roost.

roomTypes.name: Flooded Passage
roomTypes.description: Cold water reaches knee-deep through this low tunnel. The ceiling drips constantly, adding to the shallow pool.

roomTypes.name: Glowworm Grotto
roomTypes.description: Thousands of bioluminescent larvae create a starfield on the ceiling. Their gentle blue-green light illuminates damp stone walls.

roomTypes.name: Obsidian Gallery
roomTypes.description: Walls of black volcanic glass reflect distorted images like dark mirrors. The stone here is sharp and treacherous.

roomTypes.name: Limestone Maze
roomTypes.description: Weathered white stone forms a confusing network of natural passages. Ancient water flows have carved smooth, swooping curves.

roomTypes.name: Mineral Deposit
roomTypes.description: Veins of copper and iron streak through the stone in vivid greens and rusts. The walls sparkle with embedded ores.

entranceRoom.name: Yawning Maw
entranceRoom.description: The passage opens into a natural cave system, the worked stone giving way to raw geology. Stalactites hang like teeth above the entrance.

stairsRoom.name: Spiraling Depths
stairsRoom.description: A natural chimney descends into darkness, its walls worn smooth by ancient waters. Carved steps spiral down the shaft.

roomTypes.name: Crumbling Hall
roomTypes.description: Once-grand pillars lean at precarious angles, some having collapsed entirely. Faded frescoes peek through layers of grime and decay.

roomTypes.name: Collapsed Library
roomTypes.description: Rotted shelves have spilled their contents across the floor in a mulch of disintegrating pages. The smell of old paper and mold is overwhelming.

roomTypes.name: Shattered Throne Room
roomTypes.description: A broken throne sits upon a raised dais, its former grandeur reduced to fragments. Tattered banners hang from rusted chains.

roomTypes.name: Broken Fountain Court
roomTypes.description: A dry fountain stands at the center, its basin cracked and filled with debris. Statues around the perimeter have lost their faces to time.

roomTypes.name: Dusty Archive
roomTypes.description: Rows of stone shelves still hold sealed vessels and scroll cases. Dust lies thick as snow over everything.

roomTypes.name: Rotting Barracks
roomTypes.description: Rusted weapons hang on corroded hooks above collapsed bunks. The ghosts of soldiers seem to linger in the musty air.

roomTypes.name: Overgrown Chapel
roomTypes.description: Vines have pushed through the floor, wrapping around ancient pews. A cracked altar stands beneath a collapsed section of roof.

roomTypes.name: Forgotten Workshop
roomTypes.description: Ancient tools rust on workbenches beside half-finished projects. The forges have been cold for centuries.

roomTypes.name: Pillared Corridor
roomTypes.description: A long hallway lined with columns stretches into shadow. Chunks of ceiling have fallen, creating obstacles of rubble.

roomTypes.name: Sunken Vault
roomTypes.description: The floor has collapsed into a lower level, creating a deep pit. Empty strongboxes lie scattered among the debris below.

roomTypes.name: Guard Post
roomTypes.description: Murder holes in the ceiling and arrow slits in the walls mark this as a defensive position. Rusted grates block what were once killing zones.

roomTypes.name: Scribe's Chamber
roomTypes.description: Stone desks still hold dried ink wells and broken quills. Illuminated manuscripts lie in tatters, their secrets lost to decay.

entranceRoom.name: Ruined Antechamber
entranceRoom.description: Carved stone arches frame the entrance to ancient halls. Time has worn the intricate reliefs smooth, leaving only hints of their former glory.

stairsRoom.name: Ceremonial Descent
stairsRoom.description: Grand stone stairs descend between statues of long-forgotten kings. Their carved faces watch your descent with empty eyes.
